ygData.subject: Re: spell changes
ygData.msgSnippet: im on fennin ro. i have no complaints about the people ive met, but there are always TOO many people, especially areas that can be camped out.  i would go to a
ygData.messageBody:
im on fennin ro. i have no complaints about the people ive met, but there
are always TOO many people, especially areas that can be camped out. i
would go to a different server; if i ever start another character, it will
be on a less crowded server. im just debating whether i should wait for a
new server or go to a less crowded, established server. if you go new, you
could eventually have the run of the place, but on an established you will
have access to better equipment, as well as more experienced players if you
have questions.

belphenor


>From: "Lanadina the Magician" <lanadina@...>
>

>>

>>Anya
>>10th lvl Magician
>>Rallos Zek

>
>You will run into jerks no matter WHERE you go <G> But I have found the

>=)
>
>Lanadina
>Level 21 Magician
